title: Bug with new Rek'sai
body:
I've just bought the new pool party skin and I've noticed that Recall animation isn't show completely, it just stops before the jump when rek' sai eats the frog. Instead of this animation she stands still, like when the "w" is active and you recall.
Thanks for the attention.

replies.body:
I'd like to add to this. This is 100% reproducable. The first recalls are working fine. However, if you just once recall while buried, the bug occurs with every following unburied recall. I have made a video of this bug:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2881X-UArlA

Hopefully this will be adressed. Also, I don't think Rek'Sai is supposed to have two snorkles.
I can confirm this, and i noticed that this bug only occurred for me if i had a point in my burrow/unburrow, but not a level 1 with a point in my q

Hiya! 

This issue should be fixed in patch 5.13! :]
Yeah, I've experienced this bug as well.
same problem, i think when once we recalled when burrowed her recalled bug, hope it get fixed soon

Can confirm this it was quite frustrating when I couldn't watch the b animation
Also I'd like to add that sometimes as she walks, her snorkels seem to be undone like it extends. I thought it was a tongue for a minute. Don't have any pics but I'm sure other people have found this.

Oh good, it's not just me!!!! Can confirm. Usually it'll complete the cycle the first time I back, but after that it always stops and shows you as buried. Quite annoying since it's the best part!!! :c
Same here after you Burrow once the recall animation doesn't finish
